info.name: Collections Local API
info.description:
API collection for the Collections App Local - a minimal local version that analyzes and categorizes screenshot images using AI.

## Overview

This API allows you to:
- Upload and manage image items
- Trigger AI-powered analysis on images
- Retrieve categorization, summaries, and extracted text
- Access full LLM analysis response via raw_response field

## Authentication

No authentication required for local development.

## Base URL

`http://localhost:8000`

item.name: Health

request.description:
## Health Check

Verify that the API server is running and healthy.

### Response

**Status Code:** `200 OK`

```json
{
  "status": "healthy",
  "timestamp": "2025-11-30T12:00:00.000000"
}
```

### Response Fields

| Field | Type | Description |
|-------|------|-------------|
| `status` | string | Health status, always "healthy" if responding |
| `timestamp` | string | ISO 8601 timestamp of the response |

item.description: Health check endpoints for monitoring API availability.

formdata.description: Image file to upload (PNG, JPEG, WebP, or GIF)

request.description:
## Upload Item

Upload an image file to create a new item in the collection.

### Request

**Content-Type:** `multipart/form-data`

| Field | Type | Required | Description |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|
| `file` | file | Yes | Image file (PNG, JPEG, WebP, or GIF) |

### Supported File Types

- `image/png`
- `image/jpeg`
- `image/webp`
- `image/gif`

### Response

**Status Code:** `200 OK`

```json
{
  "id": "uuid-string",
  "filename": "uuid-string.png",
  "original_filename": "screenshot.png",
  "file_size": 12345,
  "mime_type": "image/png",
  "created_at": "2025-11-30T12:00:00.000000",
  "updated_at": "2025-11-30T12:00:00.000000",
  "latest_analysis": null
}
```

### Response Fields

| Field | Type | Description |
|-------|------|-------------|
| `id` | string | Unique identifier (UUID) for the item |
| `filename` | string | Stored filename (UUID-based) |
| `original_filename` | string | Original uploaded filename |
| `file_size` | integer | File size in bytes |
| `mime_type` | string | MIME type of the file |
| `created_at` | string | ISO 8601 creation timestamp |
| `updated_at` | string | ISO 8601 last update timestamp |
| `latest_analysis` | object/null | Latest analysis result (null if not analyzed) |

### Error Responses

**Status Code:** `400 Bad Request`

```json
{
  "detail": "Invalid file type. Allowed types: image/png, image/jpeg, image/webp, image/gif"
}
```

query.description: Filter by category (dynamic, determined by LLM analysis)
Maximum number of items to return (max 100)
Number of items to skip for pagination

request.description:
## List Items

Retrieve a paginated list of all items in the collection.

### Query Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Default | Description |
|-----------|------|---------|-------------|
| `category` | string | - | Filter by analysis category |
| `limit` | integer | 50 | Maximum items to return (max 100) |
| `offset` | integer | 0 | Items to skip for pagination |

### Response

**Status Code:** `200 OK`

```json
{
  "items": [
    {
      "id": "uuid-string",
      "filename": "uuid-string.png",
      "original_filename": "screenshot.png",
      "file_size": 12345,
      "mime_type": "image/png",
      "created_at": "2025-11-30T12:00:00.000000",
      "updated_at": "2025-11-30T12:00:00.000000",
      "latest_analysis": {
        "id": "analysis-uuid",
        "item_id": "uuid-string",
        "version": 1,
        "category": "Travel",
        "summary": "A TikTok screenshot about Togoshi Ginza...",
        "raw_response": { ... },
        "provider_used": "anthropic",
        "model_used": "claude-sonnet-4-5",
        "trace_id": null,
        "created_at": "2025-11-30T12:05:00.000000"
      }
    }
  ],
  "total": 1
}
```

### Response Fields

| Field | Type | Description |
|-------|------|-------------|
| `items` | array | List of item objects |
| `total` | integer | Total count of items matching the filter |

## Get Item

Retrieve a single item by its ID, including the latest analysis with full raw_response if available.

### Path Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
|-----------|------|-------------|
| `item_id` | string | UUID of the item |

### Response

**Status Code:** `200 OK`

```json
{
  "id": "uuid-string",
  "filename": "uuid-string.png",
  "original_filename": "screenshot.png",
  "file_size": 12345,
  "mime_type": "image/png",
  "created_at": "2025-11-30T12:00:00.000000",
  "updated_at": "2025-11-30T12:00:00.000000",
  "latest_analysis": {
    "id": "analysis-uuid",
    "item_id": "uuid-string",
    "version": 1,
    "category": "Travel",
    "summary": "A TikTok screenshot about Togoshi Ginza...",
    "raw_response": {
      "category": "Travel",
      "subcategories": ["Japan", "Shopping", "Local Culture"],
      "headline": "Togoshi Ginza: Tokyo's authentic 1.3km local shopping street",
      "summary": "A TikTok screenshot about Togoshi Ginza...",
      "media_metadata": {
        "original_poster": "recommend_ndre",
        "tagged_accounts": [],
        "location_tags": ["Tokyo"],
        "audio_source": "Apple Music - bloodline - Ariana Grande",
        "hashtags": ["#japan"]
      },
      "image_details": {
        "extracted_text": ["TOGOSHI GINZA", "With over 400 shops..."],
        "objects": ["Japanese street scene", "Traditional shop signs"],
        "themes": ["Authentic local experiences", "Japanese culture"],
        "emotions": ["Curiosity", "Cultural appreciation"],
        "vibes": ["Authentic", "Local", "Cultural immersion"],
        "likely_source": "TikTok",
        "key_interest": "Hidden local shopping district",
        "visual_hierarchy": ["TOGOSHI GINZA title text", "Descriptive paragraph"]
      }
    },
    "provider_used": "anthropic",
    "model_used": "claude-sonnet-4-5",
    "trace_id": null,
    "created_at": "2025-11-30T12:05:00.000000"
  }
}
```

### Error Responses

**Status Code:** `404 Not Found`

```json
{
  "detail": "Item not found"
}
```

## Delete Item

Delete an item and all associated data including:
- The stored image file
- All analysis records

### Path Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
|-----------|------|-------------|
| `item_id` | string | UUID of the item to delete |

### Response

**Status Code:** `200 OK`

```json
{
  "status": "deleted",
  "id": "uuid-string"
}
```

### Error Responses

**Status Code:** `404 Not Found`

```json
{
  "detail": "Item not found"
}
```

item.name: Analysis

request.description:
## Analyze Item

Trigger AI analysis on an uploaded image. The analysis uses AI vision capabilities (Anthropic Claude or OpenAI GPT-4o) to:
- Categorize the image
- Generate a summary and headline
- Extract text content
- Identify media metadata (poster, hashtags, etc.)
- Analyze image details (objects, themes, emotions, vibes)

### Path Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
|-----------|------|-------------|
| `item_id` | string | UUID of the item to analyze |

### Request Body

```json
{
  "force_reanalyze": false,
  "provider": "anthropic",
  "model": "claude-sonnet-4-5"
}
```

| Field | Type | Default | Description |
|-------|------|---------|-------------|
| `force_reanalyze` | boolean | `false` | If true, creates new analysis even if one exists |
| `provider` | string | `"anthropic"` | AI provider: `"anthropic"` or `"openai"` |
| `model` | string | *(provider default)* | Model to use. Defaults to `"claude-sonnet-4-5"` for Anthropic or `"gpt-4o"` for OpenAI |

### Provider Defaults

| Provider | Default Model |
|----------|---------------|
| `anthropic` | `claude-sonnet-4-5` |
| `openai` | `gpt-4o` |

### Response

**Status Code:** `200 OK`

```json
{
  "id": "analysis-uuid",
  "item_id": "uuid-string",
  "version": 1,
  "category": "Travel",
  "summary": "A TikTok screenshot about Togoshi Ginza, a 1.3km local shopping street in Tokyo...",
  "raw_response": {
    "category": "Travel",
    "subcategories": ["Japan", "Shopping", "Local Culture"],
    "headline": "Togoshi Ginza: Tokyo's authentic 1.3km local shopping street",
    "summary": "A TikTok screenshot about Togoshi Ginza...",
    "media_metadata": {
      "original_poster": "recommend_ndre",
      "tagged_accounts": [],
      "location_tags": ["Tokyo"],
      "audio_source": "Apple Music - bloodline - Ariana Grande",
      "hashtags": ["#japan"]
    },
    "image_details": {
      "extracted_text": ["TOGOSHI GINZA", "With over 400 shops..."],
      "objects": ["Japanese street scene", "Traditional shop signs"],
      "themes": ["Authentic local experiences", "Japanese culture"],
      "emotions": ["Curiosity", "Cultural appreciation"],
      "vibes": ["Authentic", "Local", "Cultural immersion"],
      "likely_source": "TikTok",
      "key_interest": "Hidden local shopping district",
      "visual_hierarchy": ["TOGOSHI GINZA title text", "Descriptive paragraph"]
    }
  },
  "provider_used": "anthropic",
  "model_used": "claude-sonnet-4-5",
  "trace_id": null,
  "created_at": "2025-11-30T12:05:00.000000"
}
```

### Response Fields

| Field | Type | Description |
|-------|------|-------------|
| `id` | string | Unique identifier for this analysis |
| `item_id` | string | ID of the analyzed item |
| `version` | integer | Analysis version number (increments with each reanalysis) |
| `category` | string/null | Primary category (extracted from raw_response) |
| `summary` | string/null | Summary (extracted from raw_response) |
| `raw_response` | object | Full LLM analysis response (see raw_response Schema) |
| `provider_used` | string | AI provider used (`"anthropic"` or `"openai"`) |
| `model_used` | string | AI model used for analysis |
| `trace_id` | string/null | Langfuse trace ID for debugging |
| `created_at` | string | ISO 8601 timestamp |

### raw_response Schema

| Field | Type | Description |
|-------|------|-------------|
| `category` | string | Primary category |
| `subcategories` | array | 2-3 specific subcategories |
| `headline` | string | 140 character headline |
| `summary` | string | 2-3 sentence summary |
| `media_metadata` | object | Social media metadata (poster, tags, location, audio, hashtags) |
| `image_details` | object | Detailed analysis (text, objects, themes, emotions, vibes, source, etc.) |

### Error Responses

**Status Code:** `404 Not Found`

```json
{
  "detail": "Item not found"
}
```

**Status Code:** `500 Internal Server Error`

```json
{
  "detail": "Analysis failed: <error message>"
}
```

### Prerequisites

Before using this endpoint, ensure:
1. Langfuse credentials are configured in `.env`
2. A prompt named `collections/image-analysis` exists in Langfuse
3. For OpenAI provider: `OPENAI_API_KEY` is configured in `.env`

## Get Item Analyses

Retrieve all analysis versions for a specific item, ordered by version (newest first).

This is useful for:
- Viewing analysis history
- Comparing results across different models and providers
- Tracking how categorization has changed

### Path Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
|-----------|------|-------------|
| `item_id` | string | UUID of the item |

### Response

**Status Code:** `200 OK`

```json
[
  {
    "id": "analysis-uuid-2",
    "item_id": "uuid-string",
    "version": 2,
    "category": "Travel",
    "summary": "Updated analysis...",
    "raw_response": {
      "category": "Travel",
      "subcategories": ["Japan", "Shopping"],
      "headline": "...",
      "summary": "Updated analysis...",
      "media_metadata": { ... },
      "image_details": { ... }
    },
    "provider_used": "openai",
    "model_used": "gpt-4o",
    "trace_id": null,
    "created_at": "2025-11-30T14:00:00.000000"
  },
  {
    "id": "analysis-uuid-1",
    "item_id": "uuid-string",
    "version": 1,
    "category": "Travel",
    "summary": "Original analysis...",
    "raw_response": {
      "category": "Travel",
      "subcategories": ["Japan", "Local Culture"],
      "headline": "...",
      "summary": "Original analysis...",
      "media_metadata": { ... },
      "image_details": { ... }
    },
    "provider_used": "anthropic",
    "model_used": "claude-sonnet-4-5",
    "trace_id": null,
    "created_at": "2025-11-30T12:05:00.000000"
  }
]
```

### Error Responses

**Status Code:** `404 Not Found`

```json
{
  "detail": "Item not found"
}
```

## Get Analysis

Retrieve a specific analysis by its ID with full raw_response.

### Path Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
|-----------|------|-------------|
| `analysis_id` | string | UUID of the analysis |

### Response

**Status Code:** `200 OK`

```json
{
  "id": "analysis-uuid",
  "item_id": "uuid-string",
  "version": 1,
  "category": "Travel",
  "summary": "A TikTok screenshot about Togoshi Ginza...",
  "raw_response": {
    "category": "Travel",
    "subcategories": ["Japan", "Shopping", "Local Culture"],
    "headline": "Togoshi Ginza: Tokyo's authentic 1.3km local shopping street",
    "summary": "A TikTok screenshot about Togoshi Ginza...",
    "media_metadata": {
      "original_poster": "recommend_ndre",
      "tagged_accounts": [],
      "location_tags": ["Tokyo"],
      "audio_source": "Apple Music - bloodline - Ariana Grande",
      "hashtags": ["#japan"]
    },
    "image_details": {
      "extracted_text": ["TOGOSHI GINZA", "With over 400 shops..."],
      "objects": ["Japanese street scene", "Traditional shop signs"],
      "themes": ["Authentic local experiences", "Japanese culture"],
      "emotions": ["Curiosity", "Cultural appreciation"],
      "vibes": ["Authentic", "Local", "Cultural immersion"],
      "likely_source": "TikTok",
      "key_interest": "Hidden local shopping district",
      "visual_hierarchy": ["TOGOSHI GINZA title text", "Descriptive paragraph"]
    }
  },
  "provider_used": "anthropic",
  "model_used": "claude-sonnet-4-5",
  "trace_id": null,
  "created_at": "2025-11-30T12:05:00.000000"
}
```

### Error Responses

**Status Code:** `404 Not Found`

```json
{
  "detail": "Analysis not found"
}
```

item.description: Endpoints for AI-powered image analysis. Analysis responses include a `raw_response` field containing the full LLM analysis output.

item.name: Search

request.description:
## Search Collection

Natural language search and Q&A over the collection. Retrieves relevant items using BM25 full-text search and optionally generates an AI-powered answer.

### Request Body

```json
{
  "query": "restaurants in Tokyo",
  "top_k": 5,
  "category_filter": null,
  "include_answer": true,
  "answer_model": "claude-sonnet-4-5"
}
```

| Field | Type | Default | Description |
|-------|------|---------|-------------|
| `query` | string | - | Search query or question |
| `top_k` | integer | `5` | Number of results to return |
| `category_filter` | string/null | `null` | Filter by category |
| `include_answer` | boolean | `false` | Generate AI answer to query |
| `answer_model` | string | `"claude-sonnet-4-5"` | Model for answer generation |

### Response

**Status Code:** `200 OK`

```json
{
  "query": "restaurants in Tokyo",
  "results": [
    {
      "item_id": "uuid-string",
      "rank": 1,
      "score": 12.5,
      "category": "Food",
      "headline": "Tofuya Ukai dining spot beneath Tokyo Tower",
      "summary": "Beautiful restaurant beneath Tokyo Tower...",
      "image_url": "/images/uuid.jpg",
      "metadata": { ... }
    }
  ],
  "total_results": 3,
  "answer": "Based on your collection, here are some restaurants in Tokyo...",
  "answer_confidence": "high",
  "citations": [1, 2],
  "retrieval_time_ms": 15.2,
  "answer_time_ms": 823.4
}
```

item.description: Natural language search and Q&A endpoints using BM25 full-text search.

item.name: Index Management

request.description:
## Rebuild Search Index

Rebuild the FTS5 search index from current database. Useful after bulk analysis updates or if search results seem stale.

### Response

**Status Code:** `200 OK`

```json
{
  "status": "success",
  "num_documents": 130,
  "build_time_seconds": 1.23,
  "timestamp": "2025-12-13T12:00:00.000000"
}
```

## Get Index Status

Get current search index status and statistics.

### Response

**Status Code:** `200 OK`

```json
{
  "doc_count": 130,
  "total_items": 130,
  "index_coverage": 100.0
}
```

item.description: Endpoints for managing the FTS5 search index.

item.name: Golden Dataset

query.description: Skip items that already have golden data

request.description:
## Get Items for Review

Get items for golden dataset review and curation.

### Query Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Default | Description |
|-----------|------|---------|-------------|
| `skip_reviewed` | boolean | `true` | Skip items with golden data |
| `limit` | integer | `1` | Items to return (max 100) |
| `offset` | integer | `0` | Pagination offset |

### Response

**Status Code:** `200 OK`

```json
{
  "items": [
    {
      "item_id": "uuid-string",
      "filename": "uuid.jpg",
      "analyses": [...],
      "has_golden": false
    }
  ],
  "total": 130,
  "reviewed_count": 45
}
```

## Compare Analyses

Calculate similarity between analysis values from different models. Uses Levenshtein distance for extracted_text and TF-IDF cosine similarity for headlines and summaries.

### Request Body

```json
{
  "field_type": "extracted_text",
  "values": [
    ["text1", "text2"],
    ["text1", "text3"]
  ]
}
```

| Field | Type | Description |
|-------|------|-------------|
| `field_type` | string | Type of field: `"extracted_text"`, `"headline"`, or `"summary"` |
| `values` | array | Array of values to compare |

### Response

**Status Code:** `200 OK`

```json
{
  "method": "levenshtein",
  "similarity_matrix": [[1.0, 0.85], [0.85, 1.0]],
  "highest_agreement": 0.85
}
```

body.raw:
{
  "item_id": "{{item_id}}",
  "category": "Travel",
  "subcategories": ["Japan", "Shopping"],
  "headline": "Togoshi Ginza: Tokyo's authentic shopping street",
  "summary": "A traditional 1.3km shopping district...",
  "extracted_text": ["TOGOSHI GINZA", "With over 400 shops"],
  "curator_notes": "Verified all text extractions"
}

request.description:
## Save Golden Entry

Save or update a golden dataset entry with curated analysis values.

### Request Body

```json
{
  "item_id": "uuid-string",
  "category": "Travel",
  "subcategories": ["Japan", "Shopping"],
  "headline": "Curated headline",
  "summary": "Curated summary",
  "extracted_text": ["Text 1", "Text 2"],
  "curator_notes": "Optional notes"
}
```

### Response

**Status Code:** `200 OK`

```json
{
  "status": "success",
  "item_id": "uuid-string",
  "total_golden_count": 46
}
```

## Get Golden Status

Get golden dataset progress statistics.

### Response

**Status Code:** `200 OK`

```json
{
  "total_items": 130,
  "reviewed_items": 46,
  "progress_percentage": 35.4
}
```

item.description: Endpoints for creating and managing the golden dataset for evaluation.
